chars.name: Default
chars.description: The song defaults to its character.

chars.name: Classic Fit
chars.description:
One of his favorite outfits. Picked during a 'Day Date' with Tess before they started dating.
Occasionally smells like Tess.

chars.name: Current Fit
chars.description:
His new, soft and cozy hoodie was given to him by Tess on Christmas 2021.
The drawstrings that close the hood make a good hiding place.

chars.name: Halloween Costume
chars.description:
Holy shit, Dipper Pines.
The missing journal can't fully complete the fit. :(

chars.name: Date Outfit
chars.description:
An outfit made for a special date night. The comfy yet formal vibe fits him perfectly.
It reminds Ben of Olive Garden.

chars.name: 'Christmas' Outfit
chars.description:
A set of clothes made to traverse the harsh winters of the area he lives in.
Always keeps him from complaining about the cold.

chars.name: Lab Suit
chars.description:
A suit designed to protect you from the harsh chemicals while 'cooking'.
May have been filled up with air at one point.

chars.name: Summer Outfit
chars.description:
A simple open shirt and some nice shorts are perfect for hanging out in Montana!
The sunglasses make him look dorky to Tess. (which she adores)

chars.name: Young Ben
chars.description:
A younger version of Ben.
His longer, more messy hair is sometimes a pain to deal with.

chars.name: Club Member
chars.description:
A nice uniform that is required to be worn durring school hours.
Smells like Tea.
chars.lock: Survive the first encounter with the one who breaks the fourth wall.

chars.name: Trepidation Fit
chars.description:
A snazzy outfit that gets you into a funky mood.
WARNING: May attract creepypastas
Suggested by @ASweetMidnight on twitter <3

chars.name: R.D's Take
chars.description:
Rampant Dabbler's take on Ben. The new jacket gives him a huge confidence boost.
The pants might give him massive cake though...
Suggested by: @Rampant_Dabbler on twitter <3

chars.name: Plumber's Drip
chars.description:
A Plumber's outfit mostly used to save a princess in another castle!...or space...
The hat might be sentient.
Suggested by @MelancholyMoni_ on twitter <3

chars.name: goljie's Redesign
chars.description:
goljie's (on newgrounds.com) (very cool) base game Boyfriend.
Now with a Left Sides flavor.
(Suggested by @HankKD7 on twitter <3)
